mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER1.EM_NO, EM_BRN, EM_COMPANY_NAME, EM_CEO_NAME, EM_ADDRESS, EM_REP , EM_EMAIL, EM_PASSWORD, EM_JOIN_DATE FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS R_NUM, M.EM_NO, M.EM_BRN, M.EM_COMPANY_NAME, M.EM_CEO_NAME , M.EM_ADDRESS, M.EM_REP, M.EM_EMAIL, M.EM_PASSWORD, M.EM_JOIN_DATE FROM ( SELECT EM_NO, EM_BRN, EM_COMPANY_NAME, EM_CEO_NAME, EM_ADDRESS , EM_REP, EM_EMAIL, EM_PASSWORD, EM_JOIN_DATE FROM ENTERPRISE_MEMBER ORDER BY EM_JOIN_DATE DESC) E ) MEMBER1 WHERE MEMBER1.R_NUM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

mapper.select: SELECT POSTING.JOBPOSTING_NO, POSTING.JOBPOSTING_TITLE, POSTING.CREATE_DATE, POSTING.EM_NAME FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS R_NUM, P.JOBPOSTING_NO, P.JOBPOSTING_TITLE, P.EMPLOYMENT_TYPE , P.LOCATION_NAME, P.WORKING_HOUR, P.SALARY, P.GENDER, P.AGE, P.EDUCATION , P.CAREER, P.PRIMARY_DUTIES1, P.PRIMARY_DUTIES2, P.PRIMARY_DUTIES3 , P.RECRUITER_NAME, P.RECRUITER_PHONE, P.RECRUITER_EMAIL, P.RECRUITMENT_PROCESS , P.EMPLOYEE_BENEFIT, P.ADDRESS, P.APPLICATION_PERIOD, P.CREATE_DATE, P.EM_NO , P.EM_NAME FROM ( SELECT JOBPOSTING_NO, JOBPOSTING_TITLE, EMPLOYMENT_TYPE , LOCATION_NAME, WORKING_HOUR, SALARY, GENDER, AGE, EDUCATION, CAREER , PRIMARY_DUTIES1, PRIMARY_DUTIES2, PRIMARY_DUTIES3, RECRUITER_NAME , RECRUITER_PHONE, RECRUITER_EMAIL, RECRUITMENT_PROCESS, EMPLOYEE_BENEFIT , ADDRESS, APPLICATION_PERIOD, CREATE_DATE, EM_NO, EM_NAME FROM JOBPOSTING ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC) P ) POSTING WHERE POSTING.R_NUM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT JOBPOSTING_NO, JOBPOSTING_TITLE, EMPLOYMENT_TYPE , LOCATION_NAME, WORKING_HOUR, SALARY, GENDER, AGE, EDUCATION, CAREER , PRIMARY_DUTIES1, PRIMARY_DUTIES2, PRIMARY_DUTIES3, RECRUITER_NAME , RECRUITER_PHONE, RECRUITER_EMAIL, RECRUITMENT_PROCESS, EMPLOYEE_BENEFIT , ADDRESS, APPLICATION_PERIOD, CREATE_DATE, EM_NO, EM_NAME FROM JOBPOSTING WHERE JOBPOSTING_NO = #{no}
